R

reset() - Method in class com.characterforming.jrte.base.BaseInput
 
reset() - Method in interface com.characterforming.jrte.IInput
Reset stream input at a previously marked position and clear the mark.
rewind() - Method in class com.characterforming.jrte.base.BaseInput
 
rewind() - Method in interface com.characterforming.jrte.IInput
Rewind stream input to beginning and clear the mark.
RTE_EFFECT_NONE - Static variable in interface com.characterforming.jrte.IEffector
Return RTE_EFFECT_NONE from effector.invoke() methods that do not affect the ITransduction transducer stack or input stack.
RTE_EFFECT_PAUSE - Static variable in interface com.characterforming.jrte.IEffector
Return RTE_EFFECT_PAUSE from an effector.invoke() method to force immediate and resumable exit from run().
RTE_EFFECT_POP - Static variable in interface com.characterforming.jrte.IEffector
Return RTE_EFFECT_POP from effector.invoke() methods that pop the ITransduction input stack.
RTE_EFFECT_PUSH - Static variable in interface com.characterforming.jrte.IEffector
Return RTE_EFFECT_PUSH from effector.invoke() methods that push the ITransduction input stack.
RTE_EFFECT_SHIFT - Static variable in interface com.characterforming.jrte.IEffector
Return RTE_EFFECT_SHIFT from effector.invoke() methods that replace the top transducer on the ITransduction transducer stack.
RTE_EFFECT_START - Static variable in interface com.characterforming.jrte.IEffector
Return RTE_EFFECT_START from effector.invoke() methods that push the ITransduction transducer stack.
RTE_EFFECT_STOP - Static variable in interface com.characterforming.jrte.IEffector
Return RTE_EFFECT_STOP from effector.invoke() methods that pop the ITransduction transducer stack.
RTE_EFFECT_STOPPED - Static variable in interface com.characterforming.jrte.IEffector
Return RTE_EFFECT_STOPPED from an effector.invoke() method to force immediate and final exit from run().
RteException - Exception in com.characterforming.jrte
Base class for runtime exceptions
RteException() - Constructor for exception com.characterforming.jrte.RteException
 
RteException(String) - Constructor for exception com.characterforming.jrte.RteException
 
RteException(Throwable) - Constructor for exception com.characterforming.jrte.RteException
 
RteException(String, Throwable) - Constructor for exception com.characterforming.jrte.RteException
 
run() - Method in interface com.characterforming.jrte.ITransduction
Run the transduction with current input until the input or transduction stack is empty, or an effector returns RTE_PAUSE, or an exception is thrown.
RUNNABLE - Static variable in interface com.characterforming.jrte.ITransduction
Transduction is runnable when status() == RUNNABLE
